channel.title: Can someone help me make a server
channel.description: ok im new at this i have Moparscape and i wanna make my own server so my friends can come play...i;ve read the tuts like i kno alot of people are gonna say to do but i dont really understand them and i was wondering if someone would be nice for once and help a guy out

item.title: Can someone help me make a server
item.dc:creator: @adamhack adamhack
item.description:
@adamhack wrote:

and if you dont have a server yet then go to this page and make one…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

if you got a server then check your runserver and your compiler…

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me make a server
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

ok runserver runs your sever

compile makes the changes to your server

your port will be 5555 or 43594

your ip will be the no-ip one (myserver.no-ip.info)

ther you go
